‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ Gemini ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏π‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏°‡∏µ Jeff Dean ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ù‡∏±‡πà‡∏á Google Brain ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏° ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Oriol Vinyals ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ù‡∏±‡πà‡∏á DeepMind ‡πÄ‡∏î‡∏¥‡∏° ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏ó‡∏Ñ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡πà‡∏ß‡∏° (overall technical leads)

Gemini is Latin for "twins".The Gemini effort came about because we had different teams working on language modeling, and we knew we wanted to start to work together. The twins are the folks in the legacy Brain team (many from the PaLM/PaLM-2 effort) and the legacy DeepMind‚Ä¶
